name: Sharty Boyz
description:
My first game im trying to finish.

I found this 2D Character controller somewhere and everything else is made from tutorials and scratch by myself.

All art done by me.

Made using Unity Game Engine.

______________________________________________________________________________

Controls: 

 PC -  

  - WASD or Arrows to move 

  - Spcae to Jump 

  - Right mouse or Left Ctrl to shoot

 Xbox Controller 

  - A to jump 

  - Joystick to move

  - Triggers to shoot

 Admin/Testing Controlls 

  - R to unstuck 

  - Z to add 1 Heart 

  - X to add 1 Health 

  - C to do 1 Damage to player

______________________________________________________________________________
